sections.heading: and school nurses; contract; minimum standard
sections.text: Sections 79-843 and 79-844 provide a minimum standard and do not repeal any law of a governing authority that provides for additional contract rights pertaining to the same subject matter.SourceLaws 1973, LB 422, ยง 2;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-1254.03;Laws 1
